welcome_message_body: Welcome to Adelanto, the charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Happy travels!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport is a major hub for shipping and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apple Valley Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Apple Valley Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
